named colors.back:
green
gray
black
white
red
yellow
blue
etc...

hexadecimal rgb colors.back:
h1 { color: #FF0000; } /* red */
h2 { color: #F00; } /* red, computes to #FF0000 */

absolute length units.back:
Inches (in)
Centimeters (cm)
Millimeters (mm)
Points (pt) - 72pts to an inch, 12pts is 1/6in
Picas (pc) - 1pc == 12pts, 6pc == 1in

relative length units.back:
em-height (em) - 1em is defined to be the value 
of the font-size of the given font
if font-size is 14px then 1em == 14px
ex-height (ex) - hieght of a lowercase x
in the font being used
pixels (px) - single dot on the computer screen
